thread.title: House looks to ban products with microbeads
thread.title_full: House looks to ban products with microbeads

title: House looks to ban products with microbeads
text:
Published By: Detroit Free Press - Today 
The particles found in personal care products bypass water treatment and end up in lakes, oceans and rivers. ...
